languages.text: {n}Из вокса доносится шорох, похожий на смешок.{/n} "Утверждение истинно. Ну и что тогда? Сбежать? Я пробовал данную стратегию поведения в прошлом, и она не принесла моей душе покоя".

{n}A sound similar to a laugh escapes Pasqal's vox.{/n} "This statement is true. Then what do you propose? To flee? I have tried to employ this behavioural strategy in the past, and it brought my soul no relief."
languages.original_text: {n}Из вокса доносится шорох, похожий на смешок.{/n} "Утверждение истинно. Ну и что тогда? Сбежать? Я пробовал данную стратегию поведения в прошлом, и она не принесла моей душе покоя".

traits.locale_text: {n}A sound similar to a laugh escapes from Pasqal's vox.{/n} "This statement is true. Then what do you propose? To flee? I have tried to employ this behavioural strategy in the past, and it brought me no relief."

{n}A sound similar to a laugh escapes from Pasqal's vox.{/n} "This statement is true. Then what do you propose? To flee? I have tried to employ this behavioural strategy in the past, and it brought me no relief."

{n}A sound similar to a laugh escapes Pasqal's vox.{/n} "This statement is true. Then what do you propose? To flee? I have tried to employ this behavioural strategy in the past, and it brought my soul no relief."

{n}A sound similar to a laugh escapes Pasqal's vox.{/n} "This statement is true. Then what do you propose? To flee? I have tried to employ this behavioural strategy in the past, and it brought my soul no relief."

{n}A sound similar to a laugh escapes Pasqal's vox.{/n} "This statement is true. Then what do you propose? To flee? I have tried to employ this behavioural strategy in the past, and it brought my soul no relief."

languages.text: {n}Ein Geräusch, das entfernt an ein Lachen erinnert, ertönt aus Pasqals Vox.{/n} "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Was schlagt Ihr also vor? Zu fliehen? Ich habe in der Vergangenheit versucht, diese Verhaltensstrategie einzusetzen, aber sie brachte meiner Seele keine Erleichterung."
languages.original_text: {n}A sound similar to a laugh escapes Pasqal's vox.{/n} "This statement is true. Then what do you propose? To flee? I have tried to employ this behavioural strategy in the past, and it brought my soul no relief."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Geräusch, das entfernt an ein Lachen erinnert, ertönt aus Pasqals Vox.{/n} "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Was schlagt Ihr also vor? Zu fliehen? Ich habe in der Vergangenheit versucht, diese Verhaltensstrategie einzusetzen, aber sie brachte meiner Seele keine Erleichterung.

languages.text: {n}Un son semblable à un rire s'échappe du vox de Pasqal.{/n} « Cette affirmation est exacte. Alors, que proposez-vous ? De fuir ? J'ai déjà tenté d'employer cette stratégie comportementale par le passé, et elle n'a apporté aucun repos à mon âme. »
languages.original_text: {n}A sound similar to a laugh escapes Pasqal's vox.{/n} "This statement is true. Then what do you propose? To flee? I have tried to employ this behavioural strategy in the past, and it brought my soul no relief."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un son semblable à un rire s'échappe du vox de Pasqal.{/n} « Cette affirmation est exacte. Alors, que proposez-vous ? De fuir ? J'ai déjà tenté d'employer cette stratégie comportementale par le passé, et elle n'a apporté aucun repos à mon âme. »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵系统中传来了类似笑声的声音。{/n}“这种说法是正确的。不过你有什么建议？一走了之吗？我过去曾尝试过这样的行为策略，但它并没有为我的灵魂带来慰藉。”
languages.original_text: {n}A sound similar to a laugh escapes Pasqal's vox.{/n} "This statement is true. Then what do you propose? To flee? I have tried to employ this behavioural strategy in the past, and it brought my soul no relief."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵系统中传来了类似笑声的声音。{/n}“这种说法是正确的。不过你有什么建议？一走了之吗？我过去曾尝试过这样的行为策略，但它并没有为我的灵魂带来慰藉。”

languages.text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスから笑い声に似た音がした。{/n}「これは本音だ。さて、陛下はどうなさる？逃げますか？自分は以前にこうした行動戦略を試みたことがあります。しかしそれでは自分の魂に安らぎなど訪れなかった」
languages.original_text: {n}A sound similar to a laugh escapes Pasqal's vox.{/n} "This statement is true. Then what do you propose? To flee? I have tried to employ this behavioural strategy in the past, and it brought my soul no relief."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスから笑い声に似た音がした。{/n}「これは本音だ。さて、あなたはどうする？逃げるか？私は以前にこうした行動戦略を試みたことがある。しかしそれでは私の魂に安らぎなど訪れなかった」

languages.text: {n}El voco de Pasqal emite un sonido similar a una carcajada.{/n} «Esta declaración es verdadera. Entonces, ¿qué propone? ¿Huir? Intenté emplear esa estrategia de comportamiento en el pasado y no me produjo ningún alivio».
languages.original_text: {n}A sound similar to a laugh escapes Pasqal's vox.{/n} "This statement is true. Then what do you propose? To flee? I have tried to employ this behavioural strategy in the past, and it brought my soul no relief."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco de Pasqal emite un sonido similar a una carcajada.{/n} «Esta declaración es verdadera. Entonces, ¿qué propone? ¿Huir? Intenté emplear esa estrategia de comportamiento en el pasado y no me produjo ningún alivio».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksundan kahkahayı andıran bir ses yükseliyor.{/n} "Bu önerme doğru. Sizin öneriniz nedir? Kaçmak mı? Geçmişte bu davranış stratejisini uygulamıştım ve ruhum huzur bulamamıştı."
languages.original_text: {n}A sound similar to a laugh escapes Pasqal's vox.{/n} "This statement is true. Then what do you propose? To flee? I have tried to employ this behavioural strategy in the past, and it brought my soul no relief."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksundan kahkahayı andıran bir ses yükseliyor.{/n} "Bu önerme doğru. Sizin öneriniz nedir? Kaçmak mı? Geçmişte bu davranış stratejisini uygulamıştım ve ruhum huzur bulamamıştı."
